languages.text: Новоявленные культисты смерти на Даргонусе еженощно возносят молитвы, дабы Неумирающий направлял руку Вольного Торговца в бою.
The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.
languages.original_text: Новоявленные культисты смерти на Даргонусе еженощно возносят молитвы, дабы Неумирающий направлял руку Вольного Торговца в бою.

traits.locale_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.
The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

languages.text: Die neu gegründeten Todeskultisten auf Dargonus bitten den Todlosen in nächtlichen Gebeten, die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} im Kampf zu führen.
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

traits.locale_text: Die neu gegründeten Todeskultisten auf Dargonus bitten den Todlosen in nächtlichen Gebeten, die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} im Kampf zu führen.

languages.text: Les cultistes de la mort récemment découverts sur Dargonus adressent des prières nocturnes à l'Immortel pour qu'il guide le bras {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} dans son combat.
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

traits.locale_text: Les cultistes de la mort récemment découverts sur Dargonus adressent des prières nocturnes à l'Immortel pour qu'il guide le bras {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} dans son combat.

languages.text: Los recién descubiertos cultistas de la Muerte ofrecen plegarias cada noche para que el Inmortal guíe la mano de su Comerciante Independiente en la batalla.
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

traits.locale_text: Los recién descubiertos cultistas de la Muerte ofrecen plegarias cada noche para que el Inmortal guíe la mano de su Comerciante Independiente en la batalla.

languages.text: ダルゴナスで新たに発見された死のカルト教団信者は、ローグトレーダーの戦いの手引きとなるよう、不死の者に祈りを毎晩捧げている。
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスで新たに発見された死のカルト教団信者は、ローグトレーダーの戦いの手引きとなるよう、不死の者に祈りを毎晩捧げている。

languages.text: 达戈努斯的拜死教教徒每晚都会向不死之神祈祷，希望祂在战斗中指引行商浪人的双手。
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯的拜死教教徒每晚都会向不死之神祈祷，希望祂在战斗中指引行商浪人的双手。

languages.text: Dargonus'taki yeni ölüm tarikatçıları, Hür Tacir'in muharebede muvaffak olması için Ölmeyen'e her gece dua ediyor.
languages.original_text: The newfound death cultists on Dargonus offer nightly prayers for the Undying One to guide the Rogue Trader's hand in battle.
